data.message: Happy birthday Em!!! 🎂 I will never thank you enough for all the things you helped me get through with your music.... I love you so much and as far as I can remember, I've always given your name when ppl asked me "who's your favorite singer?" I'm proud to be a Stan and I wish you all the fucking best man, you deserve it!! 🎊 #HappyBirthdayMarshall #ShadyTillIDie

replies.message: Hey careful Carolanne! Don't drive off a bridge doing 90 on the freeway after downing a fifth of vodka! Oh, and happy birthday Eminem! We love you fam!
Eminem is a rapper not a singer, SMH
